description: This source file defines a Kotlin class 'MenuItemAdapter' which is an adapter for displaying menu items in a RecyclerView in an Android application. It manages the display of menu item details such as name, description, price, and vegetarian icon, and handles user interactions like adding items and adjusting quantities.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: An adapter class for populating a RecyclerView with menu item data, supporting item diffing and user interactions for adding and modifying quantities.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to the views within each menu item layout.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Object implementing diffing callbacks for MenuItem objects to optimize RecyclerView updates.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates the view holder for each menu item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a MenuItem object to the ViewHolder's views, including setting texts, icons, and click listeners.
